mapper.sql: u.id as id , u.disabled as disabled , u.uuid as uuid , u.create_user as createUser , u.create_time as createTime , u.update_user as updateUser , u.update_time as updateTime , u.remark as remark , u.order_by as orderBy , u.shop_id as shopId , u.company_code as companyCode , u.express_type as expressType
mapper.select:
select
from FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD u where u.disabled = 0
select count(u.id) from FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD u where u.disabled = 0

select count(u.id) from FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD u where u.disabled = 0
AND ${whereSqlStr}

select
from FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD u where u.disabled = 0 and u.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

select
from FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD u where u.disabled = 0 and u.uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD u where u.disabled = 0
mapper.insert: insert into FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD( disabled, uuid, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, order_by, shop_id, company_code, express_type )values( #{disabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{shopId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressType,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )

insert into FAT_FREIGHT_HEAD( disabled, uuid, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, order_by, shop_id, company_code, express_type )values
( #{obj.disabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.updateUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.orderBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.shopId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.expressType,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
